data.title: Undergraduate & Graduate Degrees at Albertus Magnus College
data.text:
Strength in Numbers

98%

Of Albertus graduates are employed or in graduate school within six months after graduation

50+

Undergraduate majors, minors, and concentrations in small 9:1 student-to-faculty classes

90%

Of undergraduate students complete at least one internship, study abroad, practicum, or other experiential learning project

Event Highlights

Save the Date

Join us on campus for these upcoming, exciting events featuring Fearless Falcons. Events are open to all members of the College community, alumni, and guests. Can’t make it to campus? Many of our events are live-streamed - join us online!
